alert.note: Alert for Carson; Hansford; Hutchinson; Moore; Ochiltree; Potter; Roberts; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Texas, northwestern Carson, Hutchinson, Hansford, northeastern Potter, eastern Sherman, northwestern Roberts, southwestern Ochiltree and eastern Moore Counties through 600 PM CST... At 514 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Texhoma to 6 miles west of Morse to Fritch. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Borger, Spearman, Fritch, Stinnett, Gruver, Sanford, Morse, Waka, Lake Meredith, and Pringle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carson; Hansford; Hutchinson; Moore; Ochiltree; Potter; Roberts; Sherman
